TEXT.English: Wat Preah Pisnulok
[ICON_BULLET]Artists can also be hired using Priest slots
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Künstler können auch mithilfe von Priesterstellen eingestellt werden

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Wat Preah Pisnulok[COLOR_REVERT] adds an additional population point in all cities and adds additional food to all of your [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Priest[COLOR_REVERT] specialists. It increases the odds of its city generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].
Blue Mosque

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Blue Mosque[COLOR_REVERT] removes all unhappiness from the city in which it is built. It increases its city's chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].
Borobudur

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Borobudur[COLOR_REVERT] allows you to hire three [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Priest[COLOR_REVERT] specialists and adds additional production to all of your [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Priest[COLOR_REVERT] specialists. It also increases the odds of its city generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].
Brandenburg Gate

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Brandenburg Gate[COLOR_REVERT] resets the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great General[COLOR_REVERT] threshold when a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great General[COLOR_REVERT] dies. It also increases its city's odds of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Statesman[COLOR_REVERT].
Wembley

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Wembley[COLOR_REVERT] provides your civilization with seven [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hit Football Event[COLOR_REVERT] resources (which provide happiness). It increases the odds that its city will generate a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].
CERN Research Complex

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]CERN Research Complex[COLOR_REVERT] creates a free [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Laboratory[COLOR_REVERT] in every city. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Scientist[COLOR_REVERT].
Temple of Kukulkan
The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Temple of Kukulkan[COLOR_REVERT] increases all cities' defenses by 25%%. It improves the odds of its city generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].
CN Tower

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]CN Tower[COLOR_REVERT] creates a free [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Broadcast Tower[COLOR_REVERT] in every city. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Engineer[COLOR_REVERT].
Dome of the Rock
The Empire State Building
[ICON_BULLET]Provides [ICON_GOLD] bonus equal to city's population

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Empire State Building[COLOR_REVERT] provides a gold bonus equal to the population of the city in which it's built. It also increases its city's odds of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Engineer[COLOR_REVERT]
[ICON_BULLET]Golden Ages consume at most three Great People
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Goldene Zeitalter verbrauchen höchstens drei große Persönlichkeiten

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Eiffel Tower[COLOR_REVERT] grants a culture boost and also limits the amount of great people consumed in a golden age to 3. Its city has an improved chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Merchant[COLOR_REVERT].
The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Colossus[COLOR_REVERT] adds extra commerce to all water tiles in its city. It also increases its city's odds of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Merchant[COLOR_REVERT].
The Colosseum

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Colosseum[COLOR_REVERT] increases its city's production when creating military units and grants experience points to units built in this city. It also increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Engineer[COLOR_REVERT].
The Great Bath
The Great Cothon

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Great Cothon[COLOR_REVERT] add a bonus production to every water tile in the city in which it's constructed. It increases its city's odds of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Merchant[COLOR_REVERT].

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Great Library[COLOR_REVERT] gives its city two free [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Scientist[COLOR_REVERT] specialists. It increases its city's odds of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Scientist[COLOR_REVERT].

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Great Lighthouse[COLOR_REVERT] creates a free [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Lighthouse[COLOR_REVERT] in every coastal city and provides a free trade route in its city. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Engineer[COLOR_REVERT].
[ICON_BULLET]Reduced enemy movement speed within the walls[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Barbarian units take damage within the walls
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Geringere Bewegung feindlicher Einheiten innerhalb der Mauer[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Barbarische Einheiten nehmen Schaden innerhalb der Mauern

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Great Wall[COLOR_REVERT] reduces enemy speed within your borders and also damages barbarians within your borders. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Engineer[COLOR_REVERT].
Harmandir Sahib

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Harmandir Sahib[COLOR_REVERT] grants experience points to troops built in all cities with your state religion. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].
[ICON_BULLET]Provides fresh water to the city[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]All newly founded cities receive one additional point of population
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Versorgt die Stadt mit Süßwasser[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Alle neu gegründeten Städte erhalten einen zusätzlichen Bevölkerungspunkt

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]All units built in cities with state religion receive +2 experience
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Alle Einheiten, die in Städten mit Staatsreligion ausgebildet werden, erhalten +2 Erfahrung

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]City defense increases culture output in all cities[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+1[ICON_CULTURE] per level of every fully fortified unit in the city
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Stadtverteidigung erhöht Kulturausstoß in allen Städten[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+1[ICON_CULTURE] pro Level für jede vollständig befestigte Einheit in der Stadt

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hollywood[COLOR_REVERT] provides your civilization with seven [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hit Movies[COLOR_REVERT] resources (which provide happiness). It increases the odds that its city will generate a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].
[ICON_BULLET]+100% [ICON_PRODUCTION] for State [ICON_RELIGION] buildings
[ICON_BULLET]All trade routes are counted as foreign
Himeji Castle
Ishtar Gate
Lubyanka
[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Lubyanka[COLOR_REVERT] adds additional espionage to all of your specialists. It also increases its city's odds of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Statesman[COLOR_REVERT].
Khajuraho
St. Basil's Cathedral

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]St. Basil's Cathedral[COLOR_REVERT] adds additional espionage to all buildings of your state religion and it increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Statesman[COLOR_REVERT].
The Leaning Tower

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Leaning Tower[COLOR_REVERT] increases the rate at which your civilization generates [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Great People[COLOR_REVERT]. It increases its city's odds of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].
Machu Picchu
[ICON_BULLET]Provides +2[ICON_GOLD] per Peak in City Radius

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Machu Picchu[COLOR_REVERT] provides 2 gold for every [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Peak[COLOR_REVERT] in the city's radius. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Mausoleum of Maussollos[COLOR_REVERT] increases the length of your Golden Ages by fifty percent. It also increases the odds of its city generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].
La Mezquita

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Pentagon[COLOR_REVERT] grants experience points to troops built in all cities and increases the chance that its city will generate a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Statesman[COLOR_REVERT].
The Hagia Sophia

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Mt. Rushmore[COLOR_REVERT] decreases war weariness in all cities in your civilization and increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].
[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Notre Dame[COLOR_REVERT] increases the happiness of all of your cities. It increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Oracle[COLOR_REVERT] gives one free technology of your current or previous era, and it increases the odds of its city generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].
[ICON_BULLET]Builder Receives a Great Person

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]La Mezquita[COLOR_REVERT] gives 2 free [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Priest[COLOR_REVERT] specialists and grants the builder a free great person. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Scientist[COLOR_REVERT].
[ICON_BULLET]+2 [ICON_PRODUCTION] for Water Improvements[NEWLINE][COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Requires 20 Water Tiles in City Radius[COLOR_REVERT]

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Moai Statues[COLOR_REVERT] add bonus production to all [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Fishing Boats[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]High Sea Fishing Boats[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Whaling Boats[COLOR_REVERT] in your civilization. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Khajuraho[COLOR_REVERT] doubles the construction speed of the buildings of your state religion. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Parthenon[COLOR_REVERT] grants access to all [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Legitimacy[COLOR_REVERT] Civics. It also increases the odds of its city generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].
The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Ishtar Gate[COLOR_REVERT] allows you to hire a specialist of each type. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Himeji Castle[COLOR_REVERT] makes city defence increases culture output and makes all fully fortified units provide +1 culture. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Statesman[COLOR_REVERT].
The Hanging Gardens

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hanging Gardens[COLOR_REVERT] removes the unhealthiness of all Flood Plains in its city. It increases the odds of its city generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Engineer[COLOR_REVERT].
The Grand Canal
The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Grand Canal[COLOR_REVERT] adds extra commerce to all river tiles in your city. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Engineer[COLOR_REVERT].
Floating Gardens
Garden
The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Garden[COLOR_REVERT], the Babylonian replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Ampitheatre[COLOR_REVERT], provides bonus health.
The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Floating Gardens[COLOR_REVERT] give a large food bonus as well as increasing its city's odds of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Merchant[COLOR_REVERT].
Forbidden Palace
[ICON_BULLET]Civic Upkeep Reduced by 33%
The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Forbidden Palace[COLOR_REVERT] reduces civic maintenance costs. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Statesman[COLOR_REVERT].
Porcelain Tower

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Porcelain Tower[COLOR_REVERT] gives 2 free [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Merchant[COLOR_REVERT] specialists and removes the open border requirement for trade routes. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Merchant[COLOR_REVERT].
The Pyramids
[ICON_BULLET]Cities continue to grow when using Food for Production
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Städte wachsen weiterhin, wenn Nahrung zur Produktion verwendet wird

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Pyramids[COLOR_REVERT] centers the world map and lets cities grow when they produce with food. They also increase their city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Engineer[COLOR_REVERT].
The Red Fort

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Red Fort[COLOR_REVERT] increases war weariness in the cities of those who go to war against its builder. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Engineer[COLOR_REVERT].
Graceland

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Graceland[COLOR_REVERT] provides your civilization with seven [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hit Singles[COLOR_REVERT] resources (which provide happiness). It increases the odds that its city will create a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].
San Marco Basilica

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]San Marco Basilica[COLOR_REVERT] gives 2 trade routes and increases trade route yield by fifty percent. It increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Merchant[COLOR_REVERT].

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Sistine Chapel[COLOR_REVERT] causes each specialist in every city to generate culture and increases the culture bonus provided by buildings of your state religion. It increases its city's odds of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Space Elevator[COLOR_REVERT] increases spaceship part production in all of your cities and increases its city's odds of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Scientist[COLOR_REVERT].

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Spiral Minaret[COLOR_REVERT] gives all buildings of your state religion a gold bonus. It increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Statue of Liberty[COLOR_REVERT] gives all cities in your civilization one free specialist. It increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Engineer[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.French: La [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Statue de la Liberté[COLOR_REVERT] fait apparaître un spécialiste dans toutes vos villes et augmente les chances d'apparition d'un [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]ingénieur illustre[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: Durch den Bau der [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Freiheitsstatue[COLOR_REVERT] erhalten alle Städte Ihrer Zivilisation einen Spezialisten. Darüber hinaus erhöhen sich die Chancen der Stadt, einen [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Großen Ingenieur[COLOR_REVERT] hervorzubringen.
TEXT.Italian: La [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Statua della Libertà[COLOR_REVERT] concede a tutte le città della tua civiltà uno specialista gratis. Inoltre, aumenta la probabilità di generare un [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Grande Ingegnere[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: La [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Estatua de la Libertad[COLOR_REVERT] otorga un especialista gratis a todas las ciudades de la civilización. Incrementa también las posibilidades de que en su ciudad se genere un [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Gran ingeniero[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]No City Resistance on Conquest

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Statue of Zeus[COLOR_REVERT] removes city resistance on conquest and increases military production speed in cities with pagan temples. It increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].
Great Sphinx
[ICON_BULLET]Food is added to Production when building Wonders
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Beim Errichten von Wundern wird Nahrung zur Produktion addiert

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Great Sphinx[COLOR_REVERT] allows wonders to be produces with food. It increases its city's odds of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Taj Mahal[COLOR_REVERT] begins a [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Golden Age[COLOR_REVERT] for your civilization. It increases its city's odds of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].
The Temple of Artemis

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Temple of Artemis[COLOR_REVERT] increases its city's trade route income and gives a free [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Priest[COLOR_REVERT]. It increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Merchant[COLOR_REVERT].

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Dome of the Rock[COLOR_REVERT] provides one free [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Priest[COLOR_REVERT] specialist and doubles the Shrine gold limit from 20 to 40. It increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].
[ICON_BULLET]Doubles the revenue limit of all your shrines
Terracotta Army
[ICON_BULLET]Unlimited experience from Barbarian Units[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Victories against Barbarians contribute to Great General birth
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Unbegrenzte Erfahrung von barbarischen Einheiten[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Siege gegen Barbaren tragen zur Geburt großer Generäle bei

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Terracotta Army[COLOR_REVERT] removes the limit of experience gained from barbarians and allows barbarians to contribute to Great General birth. It also increases its city's production when creating military units and increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].
Theodosian Walls

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Theodosian Walls[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's defenses against pre-gunpowder units. It also increases their city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Engineer[COLOR_REVERT].
Topkapi Palace
Itaipu Dam

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Itaipu Dam[COLOR_REVERT] provides clean power to all cities on the same continent. It increases the odds that its city will generate a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Engineer[COLOR_REVERT].
[ICON_BULLET]Extra initial production in conquered cities

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Topkapi Palace[COLOR_REVERT] increases the amount of culture converted on city conquest and grants extra initial production in the conquered city. It also increase their city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Statesman[COLOR_REVERT].
Trafalgar Square

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Shwedagon Paya[COLOR_REVERT] grants access to all [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Religion[COLOR_REVERT] Civics. It also increases the odds of its city generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].
[ICON_BULLET]Requires a naval unit of level three or higher
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Benötigt eine Marineeinheit der Stufe drei oder höher

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Trafalgar Square[COLOR_REVERT] enables ships to be built much faster and the ships start off with additional experience points. It also increase its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Merchant[COLOR_REVERT].
University of Sankore

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]University of Sankore[COLOR_REVERT] gives all buildings of your state religion a research bonus. It increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Scientist[COLOR_REVERT].

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Versailles[COLOR_REVERT] begins a [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Golden Age[COLOR_REVERT] for your civilization. It increases its city's odds of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Statesman[COLOR_REVERT].

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]United Nations[COLOR_REVERT] triggers [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Diplomatic Victory[COLOR_REVERT] elections. It guarantees that you will be a candidate in those elections and increases its city's odds of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Statesman[COLOR_REVERT].
Westminster Palace

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Westminster Palace[COLOR_REVERT] creates a free [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Courthouse[COLOR_REVERT] in every city. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Statesman[COLOR_REVERT].

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hagia Sophia[COLOR_REVERT] increases the production of all state religion buildings and increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Engineer[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: Die [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hagia Sophia[COLOR_REVERT] erhöht die Produktion aller Gebäude der Staatsreligion und erhöht die Chancen einer Stadt, einen [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Großen Ingenieur[COLOR_REVERT] hervorzubringen.

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]No [ICON_UNHEALTHY] from Flood Plains
[ICON_BULLET]Great general threshold is reset when one of your generals dies in battle
[ICON_BULLET]No open borders required for trade
